feedback_loops.tension: Capital tension: $30-50K raise may be insufficient given rising CPMs (+27% YoY), zero switching costs, and category creation costs ($500K+/mo to scale)
Narrow vs broad positioning: Porter's supports narrow marine plasma positioning over broad electrolyte market framing
